tab1.text1:
Greeting Survivors thankyou for joining us


Dont forget to join our Discord by clicking the link below
There you can Open Tickets, Make Suggestions for the Server and chat with other Survivors



If you require a starter kit please spawn in to West Zone 1
Coords are 81.6 33.8
There you will find a hut containing the kit


<TextStyle.Green>You can access this screen at anytime by Pressing F1, or with the radial menu on console</>
tab1.text3:
1 - Play nice - This includes in game chat, voice, discord or anywhere else. Abuse of any kind will not be tolerated.
2 - No advertising without prior consent from admins
3 - No building in areas of high interest for materials. ie blocking multiple beaver damns or rare materials
4 - No blocking Explorer Notes or cave entrances
5 - No spamming of structures or spawn blocking
6 - Keep bases at least out of render range of other bases
